description: This is an HTML source file that implements the frontend interface for a database viewer application, including UI layout, styling, and client-side JavaScript for dynamic interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Reloads the databases list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cell, with support for expanded view of long text or objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggle expansion of cell content to show full data.
